TEXT.English: Visit the official Master of Mana Forum to download Patches, Manuals or take part in the Mod Development at www.masterofmana.com
TEXT.French: Visit the official Master of Mana Forum to download Patches, Manuals or take part in the Mod Development at www.masterofmana.com
TEXT.German: Besucht das offizielle Master of Mana - Forum, um Patches herunterzuladen oder um an der Modentwicklung teilzunehmen... auf www.masterofmana.com
TEXT.Italian: Visit the official Master of Mana Forum to download Patches, Manuals or take part in the Mod Development at www.masterofmana.com
TEXT.Spanish: Visit the official Master of Mana Forum to download Patches, Manuals or take part in the Mod Development at www.masterofmana.com
